data.oai_dc:dc: MBNMS/PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Weston Beach, California, USA (WES001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Weston Beach, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a HOBO U22 Water Temp Pro V2 (Onset Computer Corp. U22-001) beginning 2010-07-14. The instrument depth was 005 meters, in an overall water depth of 30 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
